title: kshINamai thiruga
sahitya:
kSINamai tiruga janmincu siddhi mAnurA O manasA



anupallavi



 gIrvANa nATakAlankAra vEda purANa yajna japa tapAdula phalamulu



caraNam



 Edi jEsina jagannAthuDu shiramuna hrdayamuna vahinci

     padilamaina satpadamu nosange bATa tyAgarAja vinutuni bhajana rA
